job.name: Docker_Swarm_HDFS_Zookeeper_HBase_Service

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: Service instance name.

variable.name: node_source_name
variable.description: The targeted node source of the Swarm, HDFS and HBase deployment.

variable.name: nb_hbase_hdfs_workers
variable.description: Number of worker nodes

variable.name: targeted_nb_hosts
variable.description: Minimum number of machines (hosts) that will be contained in the docker swarm infrastructure. This should correspond to the number of machines (VMs) contained in the target node source.

variable.name: HOST_CHECK
variable.description: Check NB_NODES >= NB_HOSTS

job.description: Deploy a Docker Swarm-HDFS-Zookeeper-HBase platform of nb_hbase_hdfs_workers region servers and hdfs data nodes. node_source_name refers to the targeted node source of the Swarm-HBase-HDFS deployment. The TARGETED_NB_PA_HOSTS refers to Minimum number of machines (hosts) that will be contained in the docker swarm infrastructure. This should correspond to the number of machines (VMs) contained in the target node source.

variable.name: SERVICE_ACTIVATION_WORKFLOW
variable.description: The service activation workflow. Please keep the default value for this variable.

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed

variable.name: TARGETED_PA_NODE_SOURCE_NAME
variable.description: TARGETED_PA_NODE_SOURCE_NAME refers to the targeted node source of the Docker Swarm deployment.

variable.name: TARGETED_NB_PA_NODES
variable.description: Number of worker nodes

variable.name: TARGETED_NB_PA_HOSTS
variable.description: Minimum number of machines (hosts) that will be contained in the docker swarm infrastructure. This should correspond to the number of machines (VMs) contained in the target node source.

variable.name: SERVICE_ACTIVATION_WORKFLOW
variable.description: The service activation workflow. Please keep the default value for this variable.

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed

variable.name: swarm_service_instance_id
variable.description: Instance id of the targeted Docker Swarm service

variable.name: nb_hdfs_datanodes
variable.description: Datanodes number (HDFS workers)

variable.name: SERVICE_ACTIVATION_WORKFLOW
variable.description: The service activation workflow. Please keep the default value for this variable.

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed

variable.name: SERVICE_ACTIVATION_WORKFLOW
variable.description: The service activation workflow. Please keep the default value for this variable.

variable.name: nb_hbase_region_servers
variable.description: RegionServers number (HBase workers)

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed

variable.name: hdfs_service_instance_id
variable.description: The instance ID of the targeted HDFS service

variable.name: ZOOKEEPER_INSTANCE_ID
variable.description: The instance ID of the targeted Zookeeper service

variable.name: TARGETED_PA_NODE_SOURCE_NAME
variable.description: TARGETED_PA_NODE_SOURCE_NAME refers to the targeted node source of the HBase-HDFS deployment.

metadata.visualization:
Error_if_empty_node_source_name
 Start_Docker_Swarm_Service
 Start_HDFS_Service
 Start_HBase_Service
 wait_for_stop
 Stop_HBase_Service
 Stop_HDFS_Service
 Stop_Docker_Swarm_Service
 Start_Zookeeper
 Stop_Zookeeper
loop
